ValidationRule.description: Prevents Credit from Editing the Application while the application is in a status that is owned by Sales.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( BEGINS($UserRole.Name,"WES Credit Vetting"), Application_Status_Team__c = "Sales", (NOT(ISCHANGED(Application_Status__c)) && NOT(ISCHANGED(OwnerId))) || AND((ISCHANGED(OwnerId) && TEXT(Application_Status__c) <> "Sales to Obtain Further Information")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Credit can't edit this Application because it is set to a status that only Sales can edit.
